name: Bug Brawlers
description:
This is my submission for the 2021 Game Off. It is bug-themed fighting based on the Udemy course How to Make a Fighting Game. This is my first game jam as well as the first game I have ever made so thank you for trying it out even though I know it is not the most balanced fighting game since I didn't have time to polish it.

Github Link: https://github.com/Kman92026/BugBrawlers/tree/main/Killer%20Insects
